com.hapi.sdk

Class Stormpath

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hapi.sdk.Stormpath

  • public class Stormpath
extends Object

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init(@NonNull
                        android.content.Context context,
                        @NonNull
                        StormpathConfiguration config)
        Initializes the Stormpath SDK with the given configuration. You should call this in your Application onCreate() method.

      • isInitialized

        public static boolean isInitialized()
        Returns:
        true if the the SDK was initialized, false otherwise

      • login

        public static void login(String username,
                         String password,
                         StormpathCallback<Void> callback)
        Logs in a user and stores the user session tokens for later use. By default it uses path /oauth/token which can be overridden via StormpathConfiguration.

      • register

        public static void register(RegisterParams registerParams,
                            StormpathCallback<Void> callback)
        This method registers a user from the data provided. By default it uses path /register which can be overridden via StormpathConfiguration.

      • socialLogin

        public static void socialLogin(String providerId,
                               String accessToken,
                               String code,
                               StormpathCallback<Void> callback)
        Logs in a user and stores the user session tokens for later use. By default it uses path /oauth/token which can be overridden via StormpathConfiguration.
        Parameters:
        accessToken - the accessToken/code received from social provider after login

      • socialLoginFlow

        public static void socialLoginFlow(@NonNull
                                   android.app.Activity activity,
                                   String providerId,
                                   SocialProviderConfiguration providerConfig)

      • getSocialProviders

        public static void getSocialProviders(StormpathCallback<SocialProvidersResponse> callback)
        This method fetches a list of available providers for social login. By default it uses path /spa-config which can be overridden via StormpathConfiguration.

      • refreshAccessToken

        public static void refreshAccessToken(StormpathCallback<Void> callback)
        Refreshes the access token and stores the new value which you can access via accessToken(). By default it uses path /oauth/token which can be overridden via StormpathConfiguration.

      • getUserProfile

        public static void getUserProfile(StormpathCallback<UserProfile> callback)
        Fetches the user profile data and returns it via the provided callback. By default it uses path /me which can be overridden via StormpathConfiguration.

      • resetPassword

        public static void resetPassword(String email,
                                 StormpathCallback<Void> callback)
        Resets the password for the provided email address. By default it uses path /forgot which can be overridden via StormpathConfiguration.

      • verifyEmail

        public static void verifyEmail(String sptoken,
                               StormpathCallback<Void> callback)
        Tries to verify an email using the provided sptoken which the user gets in the verification email.

      • resendVerificationEmail

        public static void resendVerificationEmail(String email,
                                           StormpathCallback<Void> callback)
        Re-sends the verification email for the account associated with the provided email address.

      • socialGoogleCodeAuth

        public static void socialGoogleCodeAuth(String code,
                                        SocialProviderConfiguration application,
                                        StormpathCallback<String> callback)

      • logout

        public static void logout()
        Logs the user out and deletes his session tokens. By default it uses path /logout which can be overridden via StormpathConfiguration.

      • accessToken

        @Nullable
public static String accessToken()
        Returns:
        the accessToken if it was saved, null otherwise

      • logger

        public static StormpathLogger logger()

      • setLogLevel

        public static void setLogLevel(int logLevel)
        Sets the log level for Stormpath, by default nothing is logged.
        Parameters:
        logLevel - one of StormpathLogger.SILENT, StormpathLogger.VERBOSE, StormpathLogger.DEBUG, StormpathLogger.INFO, StormpathLogger.WARN, StormpathLogger.ERROR, StormpathLogger.ASSERT
